fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Motivation: Whenever a non-Order role is Revealed on the playerlist, gain a Special card of your choice. 
- Vengeance Strike: When you die, you may send 3 Attack!s to the player(s) of your choosing. Must be chosen by the end of the phase following your death.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Recall Strike: Pick an non-Special Attacking card youâ€™ve used in this game. Gain an exact copy of it, including modifiers. You must use it in this phase or it will be discarded. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique]  
- Swordsong: Turn all cards in your Hand into random Attacking cards, keeping the modifiers/card rarity. [1 use, Unique] 
- Bladeforge: Change a card in your Hand into a non-Special Attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, Recharging, 0/3]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all Chaos and Outsiders who oppose your goal.
